about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 179: OSR New Monsters

OSR New Monsters contains tokens matching the entries for the OSR and BX monster list. These are New Monsters I made to fill in the gaps. If you already have most of my tokens do not buy the other two packs for OSR. Just buy this one. If you are just getting started and want the OSR sets buy the classic and advanced sets. You won’t need this one.
These tokens are pulled from the Classic and Advanced OSR sets.
  • Catoblepas
  • Amphisbaena
  • ape_white
  • Brown_Mould
  • Caecilia
  • Cave_Locust
  • CofferCorpse
  • Dark_Creeper
  • Disenchanter
  • Eye_of_the_Deep
  • Ferret
  • FlailSnail
  • GasSpore.psd
  • giant_fish
  • giant_frog
  • Hippopotomus
  • Krell
  • Lamprey_Giant
  • Leucrotta
  • Lurker_Above
  • Malfyr
  • Mantis_Giant
  • Mantis_Queen
  • Neandrathal
  • Ochre_Jelly
  • Phoenix
  • Piercer
  • Rhagodessa
  • Rot_Grub
  • Scorpionoid
  • Seahorse_giant
  • Seahorse2_giant
  • Shrew_giant.psd
  • Slithering_tracker
  • Spawn_ofthe_worm
  • Strangle_Weed
  • Svirfneblin
  • Termite
  • Toad_Giant
  • Trapper
  • Yellow_Mould
"
